title: Dictionary Data Analyzer
description: Create a program that analyzes a dictionary of student grades. The dictionary should have student names as keys and a list of grades as values. The program should calculate the average grade for each student and print out the student's name, average grade, and a message indicating whether the student is passing (average grade >= 60) or failing (average grade < 60).
sample_output:
John's average grade is 80.0. John is passing.
Jane's average grade is 70.0. Jane is passing.
Bob's average grade is 50.0. Bob is failing.
